isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - PRESSURE PROTECTION VALVE - DISASSEMBLE

step1.para: Remove the four screws that join the upper and lower body sections.

important.para: Care must be taken while removing screws as the internal spring force will separate the upper and lower bodies.

warning.para: Special attention should be exercised when working with retaining rings. Always wear safety goggles when working with spring or tension loaded fasteners or devices as serious personal injury can result if not properly protected.

step1.para: Remove diaphragm spring cap or diaphragm protector, spring and shim from upper body. Be sure to retain shim which is used to adjust the pressure regulation of the valve.
